name: GlobeInvestor
skdetail:

Invocation Name: globe investor
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Take control of your finances with Globe Investor, Canada's premier investing website. With this Alexa skill you can ask for daily stock prices and fundamental valuations companies trading on Canadian and US markets.

Risk Disclosure:
Neither StockCalc.com nor its Information Providers can guarantee the accuracy, completeness, timeliness, or correct sequencing of any of the Information on this skill. There may be delays, omissions, or inaccuracies in the Information. Equities trading and trading of all markets, exchanges and instruments contains substantial risk and is not for every investor. Past performance is not necessarily indicative of future results. View full risk information at www.stockcalc.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
